attributes.action: Put Tyson Fury forward to be Knighted
attributes.additional_details: Put forward Tyson Fury for a knighthood, the Gypsy king and Peoples Champion deserves a Knighthood. Arguably the best heavyweight boxer on the planet.  He has done more for raising awareness of mental health issues and struggles than many celebrities.  His resolve and determination to come back fitter faster and stronger and regain the world title should be recognised.
attributes.background: Tyson Fury is categorically the best Heavyweight fighter on the Planet. He champions Mental Health and struggles and should be knighted for his services to people with Mental Health Conditions and for services to British Sport

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
